documents.document: Another shark. Maybe 6 footer. Just chillin. 🦈
@parsley72 dunno, nothing fancy I think. Just a digital compass controlling a motor.
This device is a wind-vane steering mechanism. Not too common unless offshore sailing. Like a tiller pilot, but req… https://t.co/qZ9jVFuOcb
Spending time in a boat reminds you of what you _really_ need (hint: not much). Limited space means everything must pull its weight.
A clear night sky on the ocean is just stunning. A great reminder of how small and fragile this planet is. Goodnight all.
Speaking of names, "Smuggler's Cove" is an AWESOME name, and where we'll call home for the night. https://t.co/3k2dV5v4MD
Tanker waiting for its turn at Marsden Point, NZ's only refinery. The "Hen" of "Hen and Chickens" in the background… https://t.co/YTItloCs8G
A dramatic evening view of the spectacular Whangarei Heads. https://t.co/fiFWApKJ86
@parsley72 not really, but luckily I'm with a friend who is.
Just passing The Poor Knights / Tutukaka (hi @iain!) Light winds means motor-sailing. Scorcher out here! https://t.co/SE9Knw0DIB
The Justified Ancients of (Whanga)mumu. They used to run a net across from here to a small rock to catch whales in… https://t.co/MMWvbJwYjj
BRONZE WHALER SHARK! Just fucking sunbathing.
Oh thank fuck. He backed out.
Ffuuu... he's trying to go through the hole but he's not going to make it! Swell pushing him onto rocks https://t.co/vYmmU7uYeC
"The Hole in The Rock" with "The Hole in The Ocean You Throw Money Into" (floating gin palace) https://t.co/P6mk4wSPuA
Storm petrel dancing gracefully on the ocean surface. Also known as the "J.C. Bird" for their ability to walk on water.
Bunch of little blue penguins having a meeting off the port side.
For those in an office: I'll be sailing from the Bay of Islands to Great Barrier Island over the next few days. You… https://t.co/QKu7cKUh5m
I recommended peeing off the side of a boat as a therapeutic start to any day. 3 points of contact for the boat, 1 for... yourself.

What a beautiful morning.
Everyone take a mental health break, gather your strength. You'll need it. https://t.co/IokJ4aWcXO

It's a fucking Coup d'état. It's happening right under your noses.
https://t.co/3rwu83R1bY

The adventure begins.
Boat drinks by moonlight, gentlemen. Tomorrow we sail! https://t.co/J97okMI56a
@YouSoPunny @garybernhardt I have not, but I like the title! Will look it up.
@segdeha I regret I have but one Uber a/c to give, and I quit it last year in response to their stalking of journalists and bro mgt. team.
@garybernhardt ...also atonal, poor rhythm, or mistakes in music infinitely more distracting also! Anecdotally, I find this to be true.
@garybernhardt so background music is like constant chatter, much bigger distraction than for ppl without training (who process differently)
@garybernhardt was recently told of a study showing people with musical training at a young age process music with language centre of brain
If ever there was a time for countries to step up & show what they stand for, now is it. Humanity, compassion, decency need champions. Now.
Someone once quipped that the next holocaust would happen in airport security, since people are so conditioned to blindly follow any order.
I "used to be" a lot of things now. But growth is change. What am I "going to be" ?
This was the absolute shiz in guitar effects once upon a time. Still works! Will probably never use it again. https://t.co/RI2uGPWb4S
TFW you're going through boxes and find an old band photo. https://t.co/1LM4GWeQxF
@rossgstanle in the spirit of "process is the scar tissue of previous problems", what the hell happened there with hats in the past?

This is seriously nail biting stuff
https://t.co/P0knkqrOpe
@rands @KeriHenare There are no Legos. Just Lego.
@mexisme me too, but that was quite a few releases ago :-) hoping it's improved a lot, and it appears it has so far... 🤞
@mexisme thx! Neither of these a deal breaker for me 😬
@ryankurte yup, that's one of the motivations. It's all hunky dory so far.
@KeriHenare AFAIK not for a while now. Some 3rd party stuff has issues, notably Adobe Clown crap, but so far so good for me.

OSX stores the credentials of the last WiFi network you connected to in NVRAM.
https://t.co/kUyuedStvk

Anybody running Sierra on a case-sensitive file system?
Really want to use it on my fresh install, curious if there's any blockers.
@nzben @WestfieldNZ contest it. I did before, got 'let off' once I proved that I was shopping there via receipts.
"We will all be better at the end of 2017 than we are now" https://t.co/7SothuFj0q
Kagami Biraki ("Opening the mirror") seems very appropriate as I reflect on the past and start a new chapter. https://t.co/j2NqMv2QSw
As is tradition, my last commit before I leave Vend is a PR to delete myself. https://t.co/mV3m8pahFn
@jpdanner @ryankurte @ryankurte_ebook just dropped him off, looked relatively healthy and coherent
@TroyHammo Do I interpret that as "I have enough of this crap" or "I'll be there all week!" ?
I find it deeply disturbing that Erik Prince and his sister Betsy DeVos are anywhere near power in the US.
@ryankurte Please publish your results! I'm interested in hearing what the problem and eventual solution is.

Automating XSS detection in the CI/CD pipeline with XSS-Checkmate
https://t.co/OuwrOklcSs
@ryankurte Are you grabbing it to poke at it or just build it as a dependency for something else?
@yakmoose I LOVE talking to people in different lines of work and learning from them! Often feel too parochial in my knowledge/associations.
@yakmoose Aircraft engineer friend told me that one. It was the cause of a cockpit fire they investigated...
Airplane cockpit glass is a laminate including a very fine layer of gold,which has a current applied to heat it (for strength, cold=brittle)
@peabnuts123 I used to think I was all hip and then discovered there were social networks I'd never heard of with a billion users.
This version of "All About That Bass" by PMJ with Kate Davis is stuck in my head for days, so it's in yours now too: https://t.co/kh1Wm99fmO
@rafaelmagu it's a form of flirtation in some cultures. He likes you!
@charliedrummond and round the corner there's a secret hatch with a chute to the same spot labelled "NOP slide"
I feel like there should be a space at security cons for the excess food queue to spill into called "buffet overflow".
@nzkoz Anything's possible. Apparently he didn't know who John Lewis was when insulting him recently either https://t.co/V5Gxyq5khH
@rafaelmagu Oh sweet Jeebus. I forgot where you'd be going. A new drinking game perhaps? Everytime anybody says... anything... drink?
@rafaelmagu Safe travels. I'd imagine Friday is going to be a mental day in the states; you'll be there for that?
Is this a hat tip to the Fabulous Furry Freak Brothers? :D https://t.co/yV3O9M4cjL
@iain @sponno and I'm sure he'll build it. That's the problem with woodworking. It's the gateway drug to... more woodworking.
@sponno just get the hired help to lift shit (cc @nzdominic) :-)
@jhossnz this happened a while ago apparently, and I don't know but I would guess fluorescent tubes?

Kinda like this except it's a cutting tool revolving at 30000rpm and involving your hand. Eek.
https://t.co/rOpTyiSP6m
Just heard of a horrific router injury (hand mutilated) due to lighting frequency same as router speed, thus it looked stationary/off.
Fun fact: it's possible to spin wool and make a jersey from your pets fur. https://t.co/bs2XReVuow https://t.co/NVx7iMIsaO
@josh_robb @AtomicPlayb0y we're hooked in the grapefruit ones. Craft beers be damned in this heat. 2% and delicious!

"America votes to kill its sick kids and bankrupt the parents" is not even an exaggeration.
You should be deeply ashamed of yourselves.
All experienced and aspiring pickers in Auckland come along. https://t.co/NsqzVFdrDr
@aphyr NZ recognises same-sex de facto relationships for skilled migrant visas too. Just sayin. You'll be down soon, check it out!
@jadeshearstone @KirstiGrant @ludwigw let's just say it's enough to encourage you to drink alcohol again. Saved you a click!
@KirstiGrant @ludwigw I live with an Italian; it's an essential basic in our house too, hence my super sad face.
@KirstiGrant @ludwigw that's a bit harsh! What else did I ruin?!?
@KirstiGrant @ludwigw I love them too and was thus super disappointed to read this: https://t.co/NXrOVjo3rS
@saggis @KirstiGrant In all seriousness, that may indicate burnout. Make sure you look after yourself, be honest, and recharge.

Golden! (like the shower!)
All unsubstantiated rumour and hearsay still,but highly entertaining. https://t.co/0CuUgdFCJq
@OReillySecurity Selling the sample chapter as a "raw and unedited" book feels a bit... disingenuous. What's the timeframe for the rest?
@tveastman It's better to leave it open and redirect. @Scott_Helme wrote up a nice piece on the rationale: https://t.co/DqA5ksHF7T
@ryankurte @parsley72 Gitlab is now my default for small private projects. Baked-in CI is a great bonus.
@nzben smuggle it in those x-ray proof undies you bought at CES. 🐍 on a ✈️
@saggis Would the Consumer Guarantee Act cover this?
@OReillySecurity ...Am I just somehow mistakenly downloading the sample, or is this really all that is available at the moment?
@OReillySecurity The GDPR book I bought was marked as an "Early Release, raw and unedited", but I only get 1 chapter when I download it...
@alonsolicks me too! Always room to improve with an instrument. But fun can be had at any level.

Bonus points for gypsy jazz/swing, or a female jazz vocalist, or an unusual instrument.
But certainly not confined to any of those!

I need more music in my life in 2017. I'm open to lots of styles. I play guitar reasonably well & can harmonise
Any AKL-based people keen?
In case you haven't seen it, the Joint Analysis Report (JAR) on the DNC hack: https://t.co/dmPepDNdUw
"Curmudgeon Suite" by Peter Lange https://t.co/YRRQMkt9dX
@nz_walker you just need to make sure it's plugged in and turned on, then drill a couple of holes through the middle. That should do it.

Yo dawg I heard you liked boats, so I put like 6 boats in your boat so you can boat while you boat. https://t.co/RXpV7dB48v
@jadeshearstone @kylehqcom when are you in AKL?
@saggis nope, not yet. Will start looking in Jan. Just ready for a change. Happy to take intros to anyone nice doing interesting things :-)
@saggis Holy shit. Seems like only yesterday you were in our (and my soon to be ex-)office. Time flies. Congrats!
The great thing about the @kiwicon hoodies is that one size fits all. https://t.co/DHSsJtR0b3
